page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: We talked to several people who worked on farms. One man had worked on all kinds of farms but he was really used to a big mixed farm. If he did not have the early morning milking shift he started at about 7a.m. on general maintenance and feeding the stock.Then the cows were put out to pasture, electric fences to be checked etc. Later the calves had to be fed and the afternoon milking. He preferred work- ing with machinery and the work of arable farming. He really liked sheep and now has a few of his own. Another man was self-employed and trav elled up to 20 miles to work.He was very skilled and could do most jobs on the farms. He arranged his work care- fully to cut down travel.He worked very hard most of the year and was able to have a good holiday in winter.
